AT.name: New Art Academy™
AT.description: In New Art Academy für Nintendo 3DS kannst du neue Fähigkeiten ausprobieren und verborgene Talente entdecken. Mit über 30 brandneuen Lektionen, die deine Kreativität beflügeln, lässt dich New Art Academy eigene Kunstwerke gestalten und im Handumdrehen mit Freunden und deiner Familie teilen.

AU.name: New Art Academy™
AU.description: Try out new skills and discover hidden talents you didn't know you had in New Art Academy for Nintendo 3DS! With over 30 brand-new lessons to get your creative hands on, New Art Academy will have you painting and drawing your own masterpieces and sharing them with your friends and family in no time.

BG.name: New Art Academy™
BG.description: Try out new skills and discover hidden talents you didn't know you had in New Art Academy for Nintendo 3DS! With over 30 brand-new lessons to get your creative hands on, New Art Academy will have you painting and drawing your own masterpieces and sharing them with your friends and family in no time.

BE.name: New Art Academy™
BE.description: Développez de nouvelles compétences et découvrez vos talents artistiques cachés dans New Art Academy sur Nintendo 3DS ! Avec plus de 30 nouvelles leçons inédites visant à développer vos techniques de dessin, New Art Academy vous permettra de dessiner et de peindre vos propres chefs-d'œuvre et de les partager avec vos amis et vos proches en un rien de temps.

ES.name: New Art Academy™
ES.description: Prepárate para maravillarte de tus habilidades creativas con New Art Academy para Nintendo 3DS. Con sus más de 30 nuevas lecciones que pondrán a prueba tus dotes artísticas, New Art Academy te ayudará a dibujar y pintar verdaderas obras de arte que podrás compartir con tus familiares y amigos de inmediato.

IT.name: New Art Academy™
IT.description: Cimentati in nuovi stili e scopri il tuo talento nascosto con il nuovo New Art Academy per Nintendo 3DS! Con più di 30 nuovissime lezioni che mettono alla prova la tua creatività, New Art Academy ti aiuta a disegnare e dipingere veri capolavori, per poi condividerli immediatamente con amici e famigliari.

NL.name: New Art Academy™
NL.description: Probeer nieuwe technieken en ontdek onvermoede talenten in New Art Academy voor Nintendo 3DS! Met meer dan 30 gloednieuwe lessen om je creativiteit te prikkelen, kun je in New Art Academy snel en makkelijk leren tekenen en schilderen en je kunstwerkjes delen met vrienden en familie.

PT.name: New Art Academy™
PT.description: Prepara-te para impressionares os amigos e a família com as tuas obras-primas criadas em New Art Academy para a Nintendo 3DS! Com mais de 30 aulas novas que colocarão a tua criatividade à prova, New Art Academy convida-te a pintar e a desenhar verdadeiras obras-primas e a partilhá-las com os teus amigos e familiares.

RU.name: New Art Academy™
RU.description: Приготовьтесь изумляться – игра New Art Academy для Nintendo 3DS раскроет ваш творческий потенциал, о котором вы, возможно, и не знали! С тридцатью новыми уроками по рисованию вы и оглянуться не успеете, как научитесь красиво рисовать красками и карандашами! Своими работами можно будет поделиться с друзьями и с семьей.
